PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-05422022-05-19,  TBS,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectOrder Appointing Deloitte LLP as Auditor and the Auditor General of Canada as Joint Auditor of the Public Sector Pension Investment Board
PrecisOrder appointing (1) DELOITTE LLP of Montréal, Quebec, as AUDITOR; and (2) the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of the PUBLIC SECTOR PENSION INVESTMENT BOARD for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2022.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Appointing Deloitte LLP as Auditor and the Auditor General of Canada as Joint Auditor of the Public Sector Pension Investment Board
precis: Order appointing (1) DELOITTE LLP of Montréal, Quebec, as AUDITOR; and (2) the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of the PUBLIC SECTOR PENSION INVESTMENT BOARD for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2022.
